name: Best Res. GSHP (FS)

market_entry_year_source.notes: Assume historical penetration is captured in baseline

energy_efficiency_source.notes: 2022 'high' performance level residential ground-source heat pumps; COP = EER/3.41214

source_data.title: Updated Buildings Sector Appliance and Equipment Costs and Efficiencies

installed_cost_source.notes: Total installed cost is average of low and high total installed costs for high efficiency GSHP in 2022. For existing buildings, added costs of $6300 are the average of the cost range for circuit breaker panel upgrade and home service upgrade costs in the NV5 report, a new circuit cost of 700 $2022 using the upper bound (assuming a high amperage 240V circuit is required for the HVAC system) from the NV5 report, and additional tank removal costs of 800 2014$ (975 2022$) are applied for distillate and propane based on the 2015 EIA report, updating the cost from April 2014 to April 2022.

source_data.title: Updated Buildings Sector Appliance and Equipment Costs and Efficiencies
Residential End Uses: Area 2: Incremental Installed Costs for Efficiency Upgrades
Service Upgrades for Electrification Retrofits Study Final Report
source_data.author: Shoshana Pena, Collin Smith, Greg Butsko, Rick Gardner, Sean Armstrong, Emily Higbee, Dylan Anderson, Rebecca Hueckel

product_lifetime_source.notes: Average of low and high average lifetime values for GSHPs in 2022, rounded down from 14.5

source_data.title: Updated Buildings Sector Appliance and Equipment Costs and Efficiencies

market_scaling_fractions_source.heating: Applies to all residential fuel-fired heating; no electric heating is switched by this ECM

cooling.title: RECS 2020 Microdata
cooling.fraction_derivation: Central AC multiple of 68% was determined as a proportion of total homes with a ducted cooling system where heating is done using any non-electric heating energy source. Total homes with ducted cooling (main air conditioning equipment type = central AC = 1) in the sample is 12,211 homes, and then filtered for homes with non-electric heating system (Main space heating fuel != electricity = 5) 12,211-3,949 homes.

_description: Highest efficiency residential closed loop ground source heat pump in 2022, switching from other heating fuels
